member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Windows.PageViewTelemetryModule
member.summary: A module that deals in PageView events and will create PageViewTelemetry objects when triggered.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Windows.PageViewTelemetryModule.#ctor(Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.TelemetryConfiguration)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Windows.PageViewTelemetryModule.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Windows.UnhandledExceptionTelemetryModule
member.summary: A module that deals in Exception events and will create ExceptionTelemetry objects when triggered.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Windows.UnhandledExceptionTelemetryModule.#ctor(Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.TelemetryConfiguration)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Windows.UnhandledExceptionTelemetryModule.CaptureUnhandledException(Windows.Foundation.HResult,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Capture the unhandled exception and trace it.
member.param: A boolean indicating if this exception was handled already.

member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Windows.UnhandledExceptionTransmitter
member.summary: A transmitter that will immediately send whatever telemetry we want to transmit immediately.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Windows.UnhandledExceptionTransmitter.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.
